column1: Champigny-sur-Marne (French pronunciation: ​[ʃɑ̃piɲi]) is a commune in the southeastern suburbs of Paris
column2: France. It is located 12.5 km (7.8 mi) from the centre of Paris.

column1: Champigny-sur-Marne was originally called simply Champigny. The name Champigny ultimately comes from Medieval Latin Campaniacum
In 1897 the name of the commune officially became Champigny-sur-Marne (meaning "Champigny upon Marne")
column2: in order to distinguish it from other communes of France also called Champigny.

column1: Champigny-sur-Marne is served by Les Boullereaux – Champigny station on Paris RER line E.
Champigny-sur-Marne is also served by Champigny station on Paris RER line A. This station
column2: although administratively located on the territory of the neighboring commune of Saint-Maur-des-Fossés
column3: lies immediately across the Marne River from the town center of Champigny-sur-Marne and is thus used by people in Champigny.

column1: The Paris Métro will soon serve the center of Champigny; the new station will be located along RN4
column2: near the railway bridge known as Pont de la Plage.

column1: Preschools: Nine for the 9e circonscription and 7 for the 18e circonscription

Junior high schools: Collège Willy-Ronis and Collège Paul-Vaillant-Couturier
Senior high schools: Lycée Louise Michel
column4: Lycée professionnel Gabriel-PériIn addition Lycée professionnel et technologique Samuel-de-Champlain is in nearby Chennevières-sur-Marne

column1: Djamel Belmadi (born 27 March 1976) is a retired Algerian footballer and is the current manager of Algeria National Football Team.
Jeff Reine-Adélaïde (born 17 January 1998) is a professional footballer
column2: currently plays as a midfielder for Angers.

column1: Yan Valery (born 22 February 1999) is a French-Tunisian professional footballer
column2: currently plays as a right-back for Southampton.
(born 22 August 1991) is a Moroccan professional footballer
column3: currently plays as a midfielder for Akhisar Belediyespor.

column1: Samuel Benchetrit (born 26 June 1973) is a French writer
column3: scenarist and director[1]. He is of Moroccan-Jewish descent.
